title: A TV Show Love Story That Lasted 34 Years
summary: Sue and Alex met on a TV show called Blind Date, where people choose dates without seeing each other. Sue's friends sent a letter to the show without telling her, and Alex filled out forms at work. They were the first couple from the show to get married, and their wedding was watched by 17 million people on TV. They have been married for 34 years now. The show was very popular and hosted by Cilla Black. It started in 1985 and inspired other dating shows like Love Island. Now, Blind Date is coming back on Disney+ for new audiences. Sue and Alex didn't go on the show to find love, but they found it anyway, showing that blind dates can lead to happy relationships.

background_read: Blind Date was a popular TV show that started in 1985. It was one of the first reality TV shows where one person chose a date from three others they couldn't see. This idea came from America and became a big hit, with many people watching it on Saturday nights. Sue and Alex were part of this show and got married, showing that sometimes unexpected meetings can lead to long-lasting love. The show is important because it helped start many other dating shows we see today, and it's coming back to entertain new viewers.
